ecological

What is Climate Change?

Permanent changes to the temperature and patterns of the weather are known as climate change. Climate change is the result of using our natural non-renewable resources such as: coal, oil, and gas. People use these resources to power our new technologies, these create gasses and trap heat.

More on Climate Change

What can I do to help?

Minimize your Food Waste

Composting can help reduce the amount of food waste and benefits your soil.

Turn off Electronic Devices

Turning off devices that are not in use decreases the amount of carbon dioxide transmitted into our enviroment.

Eat Less Dairy and Meat

Steering away from animal source foods helps minimize the enviromental damage from the meat industry.
